title: Free Boards signatures for anyone who wants one :) (ROUND 2!)
body:
4:38 PM (Eastern - New York Time) EDIT: CLOSED!!! ANYONE WHO REQUESTES BEFORE THIS TIME WILL GET A SIGNATURE! ANYONE AFTER THIS DEADLINE, WILL NOT, SORRY! 

As many people know, just over 3 months ago, I started a thread stating that I would make boards signatures for anyone who wanted one. To my surprise, it got insanely popular and I pumped out somewhere between 75-100 Custom Signatures. Find that thread here: 

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/25AtVA4k-free-boards-signatures-for-anyone-who-wants-one

Welp, after some prepping, I'm ready to start back up again, so IF ANYONE WANTS A SIGNATURE, LET ME KNOW BELOW!!! In the mean time, here are some sigs from the last event!

> [{quoted}](name=Taric the Gay,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=25AtVA4k,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-03-26T14:52:54.431+0000)
>
> I like it. Does it come in hot pink?

http://www.auplod.com/u/ulaopd785ed.png 

> [{quoted}](name=A Flat Minor,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=25AtVA4k,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2016-03-26T18:44:48.638+0000)
>
> May I have one? My name is a pun incase your wondering.

http://www.auplod.com/u/paoldu78622.png 

> [{quoted}](name=KarmaCatchesUp2U,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=25AtVA4k,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-03-26T14:15:59.412+0000)
>
> HIT ME UP WITH THE MASTERPIECES

http://www.auplod.com/u/dloaup785f1.png 

> [{quoted}](name=Grandfather Crow,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=25AtVA4k,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2016-03-26T18:41:46.179+0000)
>
> This looks fun, whaddya got?

http://www.auplod.com/u/alodpu78611.png

replies.body: Looks like the tables are about to be turned. Let's see what u offer on the table
http://www.auplod.com/u/puolad802cc.png

I am very satisfied with mine. Been using it ever since you made it for me. And it has gotten quite a bit of compliments as well as some hate, but jealousy follows those who are fabulous. As much as I love my signature could you possibly touch it up a bit to include some sparkles? But prioritize mine last. I have one and there are many on here who don't and need one more than myself.


http://www.auplod.com/u/ulaopd785ed.png

I can now join you in splashing my gorgeous signature on every comment! Woo!

https://i.imgur.com/1HvNiEO.png?noredirect

http://www.auplod.com/u/pdolua802d6.png

I hope this is what you were looking for
I'd be curious to see how one of my name would turn out lol

http://www.auplod.com/u/dolupa80286.png

Copy and paste the link in between the parentheses after each comment for it to pop up :D

(http://www.auplod.com/u/dolupa80286.png)

> [{quoted}](name=The Dunk God,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=rzd8vbvu,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-06-18T20:32:11.799+0000)
>
> http://www.auplod.com/u/dolupa80286.png
> 
> Copy and paste the link in between the parentheses after each comment for it to pop up :D
> 
> (http://www.auplod.com/u/dolupa80286.png)

Oh wow that was quick lol. I was expecting it to have a little more personality to like... dripping blood or soemthing lol XD
Well you didn't tell me that :P A lot of the stuff was personalized because their name was something i understood. IDK what a kotex is so I couldn't go to indepth

> [{quoted}](name=The Dunk God,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=rzd8vbvu,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-18T20:39:21.829+0000)
>
> Well you didn't tell me that :P A lot of the stuff was personalized because their name was something i understood. IDK what a kotex is so I couldn't go to indepth

haha its kewl! But kotex are feminine products ;D

ive seen a few of em and they look good, good job.

Is there by chance you could make an exception for me? Im changing my name soon and a signature to fit it would make it all the better ^.^
Oh rip I think I missed this, they're cool signatures though
Zephyrous X inside of project lucian's dash :D

I'd want one... But I'd want to change my name to something involving both {{champion:90}} and Disgaea before I'd want one made...

These look awesome by the way!

> [{quoted}](name=Bow hunter 16,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=rzd8vbvu,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-06-18T20:26:50.715+0000)

Ahh disgaea, that edgy teen game XD

Hey Man, I know there are a ton of people out there that deserve it much more and I'm so late because time differences in OCE, but could you make one for me? You can do my current name or using "Cris" (no H lol) since I'm considering a name change. Thanks!
 {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Well at this point it looks like he'll be kinda swamped. Good luck!

https://i.imgur.com/1HvNiEO.png?noredirect

I can dream, Gale. I can dream.....
http://i.imgur.com/cj5aj2V.gif
Its fathers day, and Im with my family, so cant work on them today. I will get to you bud no worries :)
I just hope you saw my request
I will go through and check each comment, don't worry

Don't worry, I've been drumming up interest by signing a few dozen comments (so far). You have no excuse for being unable to find anything to do over the next couple of days  =P

https://i.imgur.com/1HvNiEO.png?noredirect
Can i have one with the ID Rakaroni :3 plzzzzz? with some stars and mooooon would be nicee <3
Cool. Any chance you can make one for me?
How would mine work? How does one draw "A Vanilla"? And a flying one :D

What can u imagine based off my FEK avatar?

http://videomatic3.diskstation.me/~tundrafizz/avatars/NA/31993594.jpeg

P.S. [Original video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p4v82aaJwsg)
_Please_ {{champion:37}}

Hey man, good to see you around again! I remember making a request awhile back but ... you got overworked by the hundreds of incoming requests ^_^ heh. If you never get around to doing my request, i'll perfectly understand (no really, you're being super generous so don't feel obligated about doing these requests if it ends up getting too stressful again).

With that said, I would like if you could ... have Leona (mainly her head or herself in general) attached to my username? Maybe in the back in an artistic way ... darn ... wish I could provide more details but honestly, you're the artist. I'm a {{champion:89}} main who's just about to hit Mastery 7 with her. Would mean a lot if I could get her involved with my signature. Please and thank you ... but again, no rush!!! Even if you never get to me, thank you VERY MUCH for doing these requests for people. You're awesome buddy :) i'll be happy with whatever you give me!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

EDIT: Nami works too since i'm about to hit Mastery 7 with her as well lol.

Correction ... I am **now** Mastery 7 with Leona (*feelsgoodman*)

http://i.imgur.com/M39Ofyr.jpg

Could you do one for me? Let's see what you can do with my name.
 P.S jhin main.
How do you make these? Photoshop? Illustration? ID?
A mix of photoshop and illustrator
I'll just be nonchalant with my request
